inclusion.criterion: Patients with severe mitral regurgitation are admitted for surgical intervention
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: are willing to participate in this study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: atrial septum abnormality (e.g., atrial septal defect or aneurysm)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Patient tolerated an inpatient sildenafil trial without hypotension.
